message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.MM, cs.SD

The paper focuses on continuous authentication of smartphone users using behavioral biometric features. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with authentication. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of hand movements and orientation, which are related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also mentions the use of virtual keyboards, which falls under the category of computer graphics (cs.GR). The analysis of energy consumption on smartphones is related to mobile computing (cs.MO). Finally, the paper discusses the use of machine learning algorithms for authentication, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
